name: Wok Rhythm
description:
Welcome to Wok Rhythm!

A high-tech restaurant in outer space where we cook with music. As you heard! Music! It seems that sound waves taste delicious once you transform them into matter.

Applicants for this job must have:
♢The ability to push 4 buttons
♢Any communication skills: vocal, telepathic...
♢Eyes. Any number of eyes
♢At least 3.000 years of experience as a fast food employer

Join our delicious family as we conquer every tummy in the Solar System!
